news.title: Trump says Treasury Secretary Bessent 'does not want' to be Fed chair, but 4 others in running
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump spoke Tuesday morning on CNBC's "Squawk Box" He spoke about the economy and his plans for the future.

news.title: Palo Alto CEO Nikesh Arora confronts Wall Street skeptics after company’s biggest bet yet
news.summary: Palo Alto Networks' market cap has increased sixfold since Nikesh Arora joined as CEO in 2018. But not all investors are sold on his latest deal.

news.title: Palantir stock pops 7% after blowout quarter driven by AI, efficiency demand
news.summary: Palantir shares popped more than 7% after the software analytics provider lifted its full-year outlook. Palantir is benefitting from ongoing AI tailwinds.

news.title: Pfizer hikes 2025 profit outlook on cost cuts, strong quarterly results
news.summary: The results come as Pfizer and other drugmakers grapple with Trump's calls to lower U.S. drug prices and brace for his planned tariffs on pharmaceuticals.

news.title: Russia weighs into U.S.-India tariff spat, saying New Delhi can choose its own trade partners
news.summary: The Kremlin commented on Tuesday that Trump's comments were "attempts to force countries to stop trade relations with Russia" The Kremlin said that the comments were intended to "stop trade relations" with Russia.

news.title: Here’s why Trump’s excuses for firing the jobs-data chief don’t make sense
news.summary: Let's not pretend that President Trump fired the Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner on Friday because of supposed “inaccuracies” like these.

news.title: Caterpillar expects up to $1.5 billion in tariff costs this year, and the stock is falling
news.summary: Caterpillar shares seesawed back into the red in early trading Tuesday. The maker of construction and mining equipment missed second-quarter profit expectations but beat on sales.

news.title: Trump narrows Fed chair list: Bessent is out, while these two rise in rankings
news.summary: President Donald Trump said Tuesday that he’s considering four people to be his nominee to head the Federal Reserve. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent isn’t one of them.

news.title: ‘I have never been asked for money before’: My friend wants to borrow $1,600 to pay her rent. Do I say yes?
news.summary: “I have heard mixed reviews on lending people money,” he says. “I’m not sure what the future holds for me.”

news.title: These five unseen drivers could propel the bull market even higher, according to this Wall Street veteran
news.summary: The stock market could soar even higher if these pillars of strength are unleashed, says Jim Paulsen of Paulsen Perspectives. Paulsen: The pillars of the economy could be the key to the stock market's future.
